content: half_double_crochet repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 28 3dc-cluster 28 chain-2 space 84 total round 9 glowing a start around 2nd partial double_crochet of any 3dc-cluster *fptr around 2nd partial double_crochet of 3dc-cluster chain 2 skip chain-2 space repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 28 fptr 28 chain-2 space 84 total round 10 deep teal c start in any fptr *single_crochet in fptr working in front of next round 9 chain-2 space double_crochet chain-2 picot double_crochet in next chain-2 space of round 8 skip chain-2 space repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 28 single_crochet 56 double_crochet 28 chain-2 picot 140 total round 11 bright citrus b start in any single_crochet * double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in single_crochet skip next double_crochet chain-2 picot double_crochet repeat from * around join if using an invisible join cut yarn and join if using a slip_stitch join join to 1st st of round counts 56 double_crochet 28 chain-2 space 112 total round 12 b right citrus b start in any chain-2 space or slip_stitch into chain-2 space and chain 1 does not count as a st * single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet in chain-2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet chain-3 picot double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in next chain-2 space skip 2
